QuestData.Title: The True Path
QuestData.RewardText: I have never seen anyone fight like that, $b.$B$BI am regrettably in no condition now to join the Auchenai in defending Auchindoun. I have heard stories of your fortress in Shadowmoon Valley. Could I go there and repair my armor?$B$BPerhaps... I could stay there a while longer than that? I feel there is much you could teach me.
